main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object on the evening of July 13, 1964, at 10:35.
interesting points: The object was described as a silhouette with a shape resembling a waterdrop, held about 2 degrees in diameter similar to a penny at arm's length., The object hovered about 10 degrees above the horizon., It remained motionless for approximately five seconds before moving off at high speed., The observer was parked and saw the object through the tinted portion of their windshield., The witness estimated the object was about 3,250 yards away, but doubts any photographs were taken.
witness description: A person in a parked vehicle observing the object in the sky.
